author: Simon Carswell
title: Coronavirus: Call for nursing homes to carry out their own Covid-19 tests
description: Nursing home sector struggles with staffing levels as employees, residents await results
content:
Nursing homes should be allowed to carry out their own Covid-19 testing in order to help stem the coronavirus outbreak in residential care homes, the sectors representative has said.
One north Dublin nursing home, which is battling its own outbreak, is to st… [+3704 chars]
